name: Feed the Worry Bug
description:
Created for the Brackey's Game Jam https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-7

Theme: It is not Real

Inspired by exercises to help individuals manage Anxiety. 

Created with Unity 2020.3.22f1

Project Created in 24 Hours. [So please forgive the bruises]

Resources Used:

Tutorial for Input Text 

Worry Bug Art Asset https://craftpix.net/freebies/2d-game-alien-character-free-sprite/

Font: Nauevo Orden Nacional https://www.dafont.com/nuevo-orden-nacional.font

Eating Sound https://freesound.org/people/HerraBilbo/sounds/360686/

Burp Sound https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/428137/

Background Music: Tenderness by Benjamin Tissot (also known as Bensound) https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/tenderness
